post:
I have one special plan from ComfortVPS (SpotVPS to be exact) with quite good specs.

I don't need this plan so I want to cancel it. Since this is a special plan, it is not listed anymore on their site.
Anyone wants to grab it? I haven't renew it yet. To get it you must be a registered client at Comforthost and I have confirmed this that they allow this.

### Here is the plan, price recurring at $10.99/year:

Location: Florida (some says it is in Illinois, some in Buffalo)

    * Disk Space: 15 GB
    * Bandwidth: 500 GB
    * Memory: 256 MB
    * VSwap: 256 MB
    * IPv4 Address: 1
    * IPv6 Address: -
    * ISP: Hostdime
